X.i.6.J.1.g
.
Responsibility for HLRs and Appeals of Final IDES Rating Decisions
Higher-level reviews (HLRs) and appeals of final IDES ratings are not considered part of IDES and the DRAS is not involved in either review option.
References

HLRs, see

and

, and

.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart i, Chapter 6, Section J - Integrated Disability Evaluation System (IDES) Final Ratings
citation: Part X, Subpart i, Chapter 6, Section J
